creator: jigesh_v@yahoo.com
text:
Line breaks are not preserved in the FOP-0.17 

but they were in older versions of FOP.

So, i hope that you might clear this bug and correct it as much early as 
possible.

creator: j3322ptm@yahoo.de
text:
Line breaks should be preserved if linefeed-treatment is set to "preserve".

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 1998 ***

creator: gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition to closed remaining pre-FOP1.0 resolved bugs
